# Content Guidelines for AI

- Content is business-focused and technical in nature
- Target audience: Enterprise decision makers, technology leaders, business professionals
- Geographic scope: Global operations with focus on US, APAC, and EMEA regions

# Key Pages
/: Homepage - Company overview and services
/services/ai-native-platforms: AI platform development services
/services/edge-systems: Edge computing and IoT solutions
/services/enterprise-solutions: Enterprise AI applications and security
/services/data-ai-engineering: Data analytics and visualization services
/stack: Company methodology and approach
/clients: Case studies and success stories
/careers: Job opportunities and company culture
/privacy-policy: Privacy and data protection information

- Impact: Being agents of positive change

# Competitive Advantages
- AI-native approach (AI as foundation, not add-on)
- End-to-end intelligence across edge to enterprise
- Closed-loop learning systems
- Industry-specific vertical AI applications
- Comprehensive tech stack covering AI, Edge, Cloud, Data, and Cybersecurity
